scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix ../survey-library" "http-server -p 7777 --silent" "npm run watch:dev --prefix packages/survey-creator-core" "npm run watch:prod --prefix packages/survey-creator-core" "npm run watch:dev --prefix packages/survey-creator-knockout" "npm run watch:prod --prefix packages/survey-creator-knockout" "npm run watch:dev --prefix packages/survey-creator-react" "npm run watch:prod --prefix packages/survey-creator-react"
